author: Alexis Simendinger and Al Weaver
title: The Hill's Morning Report - Presented by Facebook - Biden vs. Trump as Sanders exits race
content:
Presented by Facebook
Welcome to The Hills Morning Report. Its Thursday. We get you up to speed on the most important developments in politics and policy, plus trends to watch. Alexis Simendinger and Al Weaver are the daily co-creators, so find us @asimendin… [+26567 chars]
